## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description        | Type                                                        | Default       |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------- | ------------- |
| `size`    | `size`    | Size of spinner    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "x-small" \| "xx-small"` | `'medium'`    |
| `variant` | `variant` | Variant of spinner | `"primary" \| "secondary"`                                  | `'secondary'` |
